newsitem.title: JAPAN: U.S. Treasuries steady, well-supported in Tokyo.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Treasuries steady, well-supported in Tokyo.

text.p: U.S. Treasuries were little changed by Tokyo midday on Thursday following sharp losses overnight, as buying-on-dips demand provided some support, traders said.
Improved market sentiment and the dollar's recent fall against the yen led to some purchases by Japanese institutional investors, they said.
But there were few incentives to drive prices convincingly above the closing levels in New York, they said.
Market participants will be waiting for a speech by Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan in New York later on Thursday, hoping for clues to the near term trend, they said.
